page.title: 03Tourism
page.content: We interviewed at random 35 holiday makers on Avon Beach Mudeford.We discovered 28 people had visited the area before.Reasons given ranged from "near to home""lovely beach""a good touring base"to just "we like it".A large number were visiting on recommendation or visiting friends or relatives. Nearly half the holidaymakers were staying for a week,only 2 were staying longer than 2 weeks. 7 people had come from within a 50 mile radius of Mudeford and 9 from the London area.3 by coach,the rest by car Accomodation:caravans 11,holiday homes 7,hotels 7,family/friends 6,tents 4. Pastimes enjoyed:sunbathing,swimming, walking,visiting places of interest, sailing,fishing.
